tweet_text: @martinbeanz @RadioRayRTE @RTERadio1 @anningle And you'll be interested in this: The nuns in Lakelands Convent used to bring black plastic bags of old clothes for us eight children - and anything we couldn't use we passed on again to the lovely Traveller woman who would call to the door every so often. Proper recycling! x
